lead_paragraph: Huang Yizi was sentenced by the People’s Court in Pingyang County after being convicted of “gathering crowds to disturb social order.”

headline.main: Christian Pastor in China Gets One-Year Prison Term in Battle Over Crosses
headline.print_headline: Christian Pastor in China Gets One-Year Prison Term in Battle Over Crosses

snippet: Huang Yizi was sentenced by the People’s Court in Pingyang County after being convicted of “gathering crowds to disturb social order.”
